plot(NA, xlim = c(0, 10), ylim = c(0, 10), xlab = "", ylab = "", las = 1, bty = "n", axes = FALSE, main = "UNDER THE SEA")


# Level 0
## Horizontal lines
lines(c(0, 10), c(0, 0))
lines(c(0, 10), c(2, 2))
## Vertical lines
lines(c(0, 0), c(0, 2))
lines(c(10, 10), c(0, 2))
## Colour
x <- c(0,10, 10, 0, 0)
y <- c(0,0, 2, 2, 0)
polygon(x, y, col = "#f0eda4", border = "black")

# Number of sprinkles
num_sprinkles <- 20

# Generate random coordinates for sprinkles within the specified range
sprinkle_x <- runif(num_sprinkles, min = 0.2, max = 9.8)
sprinkle_y <- runif(num_sprinkles, min = 0.2, max = 1.8)

# Draw random striped sprinkles
for (i in 1:num_sprinkles) {
  x <- sprinkle_x[i]
  y <- sprinkle_y[i]
  
  # Generate random stripe length and angle
  stripe_length <- runif(1, min = 0.1, max = 0.5)
  stripe_angle <- runif(1, min = 0, max = 2 * pi)
  
  # Calculate stripe end points
  x1 <- x - 0.5 * stripe_length * cos(stripe_angle)
  y1 <- y - 0.5 * stripe_length * sin(stripe_angle)
  x2 <- x + 0.5 * stripe_length * cos(stripe_angle)
  y2 <- y + 0.5 * stripe_length * sin(stripe_angle)
  
  # Generate a vector of 5 random colors
random_colors <- rgb(runif(5), runif(5), runif(5))
  # Draw the stripe
  segments(x1, y1, x2, y2, col = random_colors, lwd = 2)
}

  center_x <- 3.8
  offset <- (i - 0.2) * interval
  
  x <- c(center_x + offset, center_x + offset + 0.1, center_x + offset + 0.1, center_x + offset, center_x + offset)
  y <- c(9, 9, 9.5, 9.5, 9)
  polygon(x, y, col = "#8ec4a8", border = "grey")}

## NUMBER 1
draw_diamond <- function(x_center, y_center, width, height) {

  # Define the coordinates for the diamond shape
  x <- c(x_center, x_center + width/2, x_center, x_center - width/2, x_center)
  y <- c(y_center - height/2, y_center, y_center + height/2, y_center, y_center - height/2)

  # Draw the diamond shape
  polygon(x, y, col = "orange", border = "red")
}

# Adjust dimensions and starting position for the diamond
draw_diamond(x_center = 4.15, y_center = 9.8, width = 0.15, height = 0.3)

draw_seashell <- function(x_center, y_center, size){
  # Define the coordinates for the seashell shape
  x <- c(x_center, x_center + 0.2*size, x_center + 0.5*size, x_center + 0.2*size, x_center - 0.2*size, x_center - 0.5*size, x_center - 0.2*size, x_center)
  y <- c(y_center, y_center + 0.8*size, y_center + 0.5*size, y_center + 0.2*size, y_center + 0.2*size, y_center + 0.5*size, y_center + 0.8*size, y_center)

  # Draw the seashell shape
  polygon(x, y, col = "#8ec4a8", border = "darkred")
}

# Adjust dimensions and starting position for the seashell
draw_seashell(x_center = 2.5, y_center = 2.2, size = 2)
